thread.title: Blog Post: YouTuber Builds Lego Version Of Widowmaker's Sniper Rifle From Overwatch
thread.title_full: Blog Post: YouTuber Builds Lego Version Of Widowmaker's Sniper Rifle From Overwatch

author: Elise Favis
title: Blog Post: YouTuber Builds Lego Version Of Widowmaker's Sniper Rifle From Overwatch

organizations.name: youtuber builds lego version of widowmaker

text:
YouTuber Builds Lego Version Of Widowmaker's Sniper Rifle From Overwatch gamer culture by Elise Favis on February 19, 2017 at 04:30 PM 3,803 Views 3 
YouTuber ZaziNombies, known for his Lego creations inspired by video games, has dedicated his latest project to building Widowmaker's sniper rifle from Overwatch. 
The French, villainous Widowmaker is best known for perfecting her kill shots and finding the best vantage points to take out her foes from afar. While it doesn't fire anything, ZaziNombies' replica has "realistic reload action" and the design, such as the translucent red scope, is made to look as similar as possible to the original. The replica measures four feet long, and is made with an estimated 1,800 Lego bricks. 
This isn't the first time ZaziNombies created a Lego weapon inspired by Overwatch. Check out his Lego creation of Reaper's shotguns here . 
For more of ZaziNombies' creations, take a look at his YouTube channel . His past works include building replicas for Doom's BFG 9000 and Claptrap from Borderlands . 
Email the author , or follow on Game Informer .
